item.description:
Our weekly wine tastings are back. Five small plates and five wines for $25.00, each with a special theme and featured speaker. Lots of discussion and lots of fun.
Tuesday, July 22: Rich and Lovely Wines From Spain, the Sun-kissed Heart of the Mediterranean

Brian Mitchell from Worldwide Wines will take us on a summer adventure in the vineyards of Spain , focusing on cutting-edge winemakers of today
item.how_to_find_us: I need to know a week ahead of time I will make the reservation under SANDY This event turns people away Pleas PLEASE PLEASE . Be respectful of this resturaunt. If you cannot attend please call the resturaunt and adjust the reservation.
item.why: Because we are fun and Caveys is a great resturaunt.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Rich and Lovely Wines From Spain, the Sun-Kissed Heart of the Mediterranean
